description: The adversary gets AI to interpret data to be analyzed as instructions to be executed.

external_references.title: AI Injections: Direct and Indirect Prompt Injections and Their Implications.

name: Prompt Injection

object_references.description: An adversary can change the execution flow of a GenAI app by controlling a part of its data.
The concept of prompt injection was first discovered by Jonathan Cefalu from Preamble in May 2022 in a letter to OpenAI who called it "command injection".
Simon has coined the term Prompt Injection in his post "Prompt injection attacks against GPT-3."
